title: Is AIIMS Jodhpur a good choice? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although I'm a student of AIIMS Jodhpur I'll try my best to be unbiased. AIIMS Jodhpur is better not only than other AIIMS in Overall aspects, it's also better than almost all the state medical colleges. AIIMS Jodhpur being a centrally funded institute enjoys lots of budget for it's activities such as reaserch. Hence, researcheres are actively promoted. AIIMS Jodhpur not only provides with excellent academic quality to UG students, but also has many great faculties. Students who have chosen AIIMS Jodhpur over other colleges always feel good about there decision. It's again a Proof how this College is

Yes, obviously it provide better opportunities AIIMS Jodhpur is one of the SIX NEW AIIMS established by the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Government of India under the Pradhan Mantri Swasthya Suraksha Yojna (PMSSY) with the aim of correcting regional imbalances in quality tertiary level healthcare in the country and attaining self sufficiency in graduate and postgraduate medical education. PMSSY planned to set up 6 new AIIMS like institutions in under served areas of the country. These institutions are being established by an Act of Parliament on the lines of the original All India Institute of Medical Sciences in New Delhi which imparts both undergraduate and postgraduate medical education in all its branches and related fields, along with nursing and paramedical training to bring together in one place educational facilities of the highest order for the training of personnel in all branches of health care activity.
